description: I could do research without Zotero. It's a great and flexible paper organizing/reading/citing tool. Much better than the alternatives (like Mendeley). I would highly recommend checking out the add-ons because they are very useful in general and allow to create a personalized workflow depending on someones needs.
Each time i try to open a file, I get a pop-up: "allow opening file?"
summary: great app, snap doesn't work great

description:
Nice app. 
Removing the pop-up prompt for opening files would be a plus.
It needs more functionality, but overall is very nice.
Light on computer and have all features I need. Even on a old laptop, it works better than its nearest competitor.

yes ,as you see ,when you use the updated zotero,you can feace the problem like when you open one pdf ,the application prompt one window show that you should "open with ***". so you can go to the zotern's edit -> preference->general ->open PDFs using chang the default pdf viewer
Good app to manage literature across devices.
Powerful and easy
I don't have an in-depth review since I don't use it to an in-depth level. But I love how simple it is to use, and how easily it works with Chrome.
summary: I don't use it in-depth, but it is great for what I do use it for

description: Freat app for researchers
Citation can't work! Need help.
It is really helpful for articles, books and other bibliography. Really fast and reliable

My spouse is a researcher and this app is used frequently to add citations and bibliographies to papers and grant applications. Add app to any PC and sync your account to create local version of your remote files. Quickly add citations from PubMed and other websites. Easily add different styles for citations/references.

Do not use this. Go to the Zotero website and follow the instructions to properly install on Linux using the downloadable tarball. Gave more than one star as it seems that it can be used if you don't care about the word processor integration - but that's a major dealbreaker for most of us!
summary: Installer does not set word processor integration

description: free and syncable
thanks! great snap
There is a companion iOS app that syncs with the desktop version allowing me to read papers on the phone.
summary: The solution to my ever growing list of papers

description: I keep discovering new features that provide elegant und lean solutions to smaller or bigger inconveniences of finding, reviewing and organizing scientific lituratur. What I love about Zotero is that facilitates your work without overcomplicating things. As a PhD student I'm using Zotero at least 1-3h /day. I am more than satisfied, can highly recommend!
Tried every troubleshoot I could find online and nothing got it working
I like Zotero. Once you have set everything up, it is very easy to use. The only thing that is a bit tricky is the set-up of the Java run-time environment in LibreOffice.
just download it on ubuntu and it is really easy and intuitive to use. Simply love it.
Only 300MB of free storage and the next option is $20 for 2GB. That's simply unreasonable.
Tachido 20 de 10
Don't have any issues with the app. Works like a Switzerland watches.
great app, would recommend
Gutes Programm zur Literaturverwaltung bei kleineren Projekten.
Hey, die Plugins in LibreOffice tauchen nicht auf.. könnt ihr mir da weiterhelfen?

Ich glaube, dass es ein Problem mit der Snap-Integration von Zotero und Libre Office gibt. Ich habe Zotero und LO per ppa (nicht über das Softwarecenter) installiert und anschließend war das Plugin funktionsfähig. Hoffe das hilft euch weiter.

Hi (Lea),

ich habe genau das gleiche Problem, und zwar, dass sich Zotero nicht mit libre office verbindet. 
Hast du zufällig schon eine Lösung dafür gefunden?

LG
Zotero works as standalone, but it's not possible to connect with LibreOffice. LO doesn't recognize my JDK, although it is installed. Seems to be a snap issue, but no helpful solution up to now.
summary: Doesn't work with LibreOffice on Ubuntu 22.04

description:
- In LibreOffice unter "Extras, Optionen, Erweitert" prüfen, ob Java installiert ist, falls nicht, z. B. Openjdk installieren
- Falls es immer noch nicht angezeigt wird, dann fehlt evtl. libreoffice-java-common. Nachinstallieren mittels Terminal und root-Rechten mit "apt install libreoffice-java-common"
- Dann sollte die java-Version im Libreoffice angezeigt werden.
- Nun sollte sich über Zotero das Plugin einbinden lassen.
Falls nicht: manuell hinzufügen: Siehe Link bei Zotero-Doku
- Der Speicherort ist bei Snap-Installation unter /snap/zotero-snap/usw.
Es una gran herramienta y tenerla en snap facilita mucho las cosas
El mejor gestor de bibliografia, sin duda

Creo que Zotero es el mejor gestor bibliográfico, no solo posee una gran cantidad de sistemas de citación, sino que además tiene complementos para Firefox, Libreoffice, Docs de Google. Además es posible personalizarlo.
Funciona de maravilla!. Es importante tener instalado el paquete de libreoffice-java-common package y asegurarse de trabajar con las versiones mas recientes del libreoffice.
He probado varios de los más conocidos y de momento Zotero es el que me ha resultado más útil, y además es libre.
summary: El mejor gestor bibliográfico que he probado

description: La aplicación se instala bien y sincroniza, pero la extensión del libreoffice no funciona y afirma que son problemas de JAVA. No se de sistemas, razón por la cual no lo puedo solucionar y si no sirve la extensión a libreoffice, en mi caso no es funcional esta aplicación. A desinstalar y buscar otra alternativa.
summary: La aplicación no funciona en libreoffice

description: Útil para gestionar información si eres investigador
Es bastante util, intuitiva y funciona a la perfeccion ya sea por si sola o por sus extensiones.
summary: De las mejores aplicaciones para citas en Ubuntu,

description: facile à utiliser, petit bémol, documentation en langue anglaise

Bonne intégration, le compte gratuit est largement suffisant et permet de synchroniser des centaines de liens entre PC + trier et créer des bibliographies.
Des tutoriels existent en français au besoin : https://www.zotero.org/support/fr/quick_start_guide ou encore https://zestedesavoir.com/tutoriels/2041/gerez-votre-bibliographie-avec-zotero/
summary: Facile à utiliser, portable et bien intégré aux navigateurs

description: Parfait, fonctionne idéalement bien.
Je viens de migrer sous Ubuntu 22.04. L'import de la bibliothèque ne fonctionne pas.

La bibliothèque zotéro s'est bien installée sur mon ordinateur tournant sous Ubuntu, par contre, le plugin permettant d'utiliser Zotéro avec Libre Office ne fonctionne pas... Je ne peux donc pas utiliser Zotéro pour mes notes de bas de page, pour générer une bibliographie, etc. 
Comment régler ce problème ? 
Car c'est bien pour cette raison que j'ai installé Zotéro : pour avoir des notes de bas de page homogènes et citer mes sources rapidement...
Changement de dossier de base pour les pièces joints, ne fonctionne pas ni en passant par les préférences de zotero, ni ne passant par zotfiles
summary: Ne fonctionne pas correctement sous ubuntu

description: 升级到24.04后，程序出错，假死。
